name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 1 - In Search of the Skunk-Ape
name_original: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 1 - In Search of the Skunk-Ape
description: Ben's first case finds him in the Florida Everglades looking for something known as "The Skunk-Ape" which is said to be a local variation on Bigfoot. Several park rangers have been murdered, and so Ben is called in to investigate the possibility that the Skunk-Ape is involved.
